name: The First Crest
explicitMods: Aureus Coins are converted to Tainted Currency upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum
descrText: Place this item on the Relic Altar at the start of each Sanctum run
flavourText: "In pursuit of divinity, he tried many times to found a religion. Few followed his initial symbols and proverbs. He needed something greater. A symbol none could deny." - Lycia, the Heretic
